      • allocateProfits

        private void allocateProfits()
        given the surplus of means of production and the available funds, allocate the funds to the industries in a systematic way. Initially while we are testing two-department models this takes the simple form of trying to invest at the desired rate and giving up if we can't.

        type - the industry type of the circuit
        Returns:
        the amount that was allocated
